edu.umass.cs.surveyman.qc

Class AbstractRespondent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.surveyman.qc.AbstractRespondent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LexicographicRespondent, NonRandomRespondent, RandomRespondent

    public abstract class AbstractRespondent
extends Object
    Base class for all respondents. Respondent constructors take the survey and set up all preferences.

    • Method Detail

      • getResponse

        public abstract SurveyResponse getResponse()
        Method to obtain the simulated survey response for the survey that this respondent was instantiated with.
        Returns:
        The respondent's answer to the survey.

      • getDenominator

        protected int getDenominator(Question q)
        Gets the size of the response space for a given question. For example, if the question is exclusive (i.e., a radio button question), this will return the number of possible options. If the question is not exclusive (i.e., a checkbox question), this will return 2^|number of options|.
        Parameters:
        q - The question whose sample space we wish to know.
        Returns:
        An integer corresponding to the size of the sample space.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - Cannot be called on freetext questions.

      • generateStringComponent

        protected String generateStringComponent(Question q)
        Generates a string for freetext questions. If the input question's freetextPattern field is not null, it will generate a random regular expression. If the freetextPattern field is null, but the freetextDefault field is not, it will return the default string. Otherwise, it will return the string "DEFAULT".
        Parameters:
        q -
        Returns:
        Returns an appropriate string.

      • copy

        public abstract AbstractRespondent copy()
                                 throws SurveyException
        Returns a copy of this respondent type. Use when running simulation. Otherwise, the entire pool of respondents will be the same object and quality control won't work.
        Returns:
        New respondent, based on the same policy as this respondent.
        Throws:
        SurveyException
